sourcesContent:
Google Sign-In Example

@if (!user) {
} @else {

Welcome, {{ user.displayName || 'User' }}!

Email: {{ user.email }}

@if (user.emailVerified) { Verified }
} @if (items && items.length > 0) {

Your Items:

    @for (item of items; track item) {
  • {{ item }}
    • }
} @if (message) {
{{ message }}
}
